IndexPage.title: Hi, my name is Sebasti√°n and I am a software developer.
IndexPage.description: I am a developer specialized in turning ideas into innovative web applications. Discover my portfolio to explore my experience and most recent projects.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.paragraph1: I am a web developer and software designer located in Colombia. I am passionate about creating beautiful, functional and user-centric digital experiences. I am always looking for new and innovative ways to bring my clients' visions to life.
AboutPage.paragraph2: I'm interested in the whole web development stack like trying new things and creating great projects. I am an independent and innovative professional. I love sports, gymnastics, anime and reading books.
AboutPage.paragraph3: When I am working on a website or a digital project, I bring my commitment and use the best practices guaranteeing the user experience and a minimalist design. I believe that everything is an Art when you put your consciousness into it.
